value.title: Map locations using Power BI shape maps (Part 1)
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to use Power BI visual: Shape maps.  Have you created a country json file? Give it to David! value.title: Refresh Power BI every second or minute!
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you how to refresh Power BI every minute or any interval you yet :).
